titles.title: A resolution honoring the 25th Anniversary of the Cerro Tololo Inter-American Observatory.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/8/1988--Introduced. Honors and applauds the contributions of the Cerro Tololo Inter-American Observatory in La Serena, Chile, on its 25th anniversary.
